poem:
### Ghost Texts

Beneath his thumbs, the letters float—  
apologies whispered in digital ink,  
forgotten on the wind.  
A name erased like chalk-dust on slate,  
truth smudged by thumbs too sly.  
Innocence wavers, breathes cold,  
and history writes its own forgotten sighs.
